body.name: A9 Mini Camera WiFi 1080P HD IP Camera Home Security Magnetic Wireless Mini Camcorder Micro Video Surveillance Camera with IR Night Vision
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 18 mins
features: Million HD quality: Built-in six layers optical lens double coated clear and dedicate picture quality
Night Vision: Even without the light, the light screen is clearly visible. You will never be in the dark

Non-stop Loop Recording: It is built in rechargeable battery that allows the camera to work for 1 hour; it also can be used with USB charger connected to power bank or power socket. Nothing will be missed.

Working on 2.4GHz Wifi: This wireless network camera can work on WiFi (2.4GHz WiFi only) or without WiFi, when there is no WiFi, insert the TF card and turn on the camera, and the camera will record and save to the TF card.

Real-time Viewing：Wireless IP camera allows you to view what is happening at home or in the office in real for time, even if you are on vacation or fast business trip, the remote view can be accessed through the smartphone APP.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wireless Mini WiFi Camera （This camera only support 2.4G Wifi )

2.4G Wireless Mini WiFi Camera A Great Choice for all of Your Surveillance Needs. Home Security in Your Hands Whenever you're using a smartphone computer device, you can view the HD live streaming by camera's APP. You can easy to operate mini camera. Just insert a micro sd card and turn on You can put the camera in the corner of home,office, warehouse, store,backyard, garden, even in your pocket or on your collar with a strong Specifications: Resolution: 1080 HD Frame rate: 30fps Video format: AFS Viewing angle: 90° Motion detection distance: 6 meters straight line Memory card type: Support 8G/16G/32G/64G TF card Mobile phone operating system: for Android/for iOS PC OS: for Windows, for Mac OS X Continuous recording time: more than 1 hour Minimum illumination: 1LUX Compression format: H. 264 Recording range: 5m2 Power consumption: 240mA/3. 7V Playback software: VL CPlaver/SMPlayer Storage temperature: -20~+80 degrees Celsius Operating temperature: -10~+60 degrees Celsius Operating humidity: 15-80% RH Package Included: a9 mini wifi camera*1 Snake pipeline charging cable*1 USB charging cable*1 360 degree bracket*1

Built-in Magnet: Can be attached to any metal, magnetic surface. Non-Stop recording Camera can work on WiFi (2.4GHz WiFi only) or No WiFi. When it works on No WiFi, insert a TF card (TF card not include) and turn on, the camera will recording and saves the video files to the SD card (SD card not include). Night Vision Even without the light, the light screen is clearly visible. You will never be in the dark

1080P HD 1080P High defination, brings you a different experience, perfect for home office indoor security. Function Support WiFi, Video, Camera, Loop Recording, Motion Detection, Infrared Night Vision, Time Display. Features HD 1080P Video & 90° Lens: the mini spy camera allows you to see more details happening in the room. The quality lens also features 1080P video and pictures that perfect surveillance camera for your Office or business place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Never could get it to work
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are horrid. Doesn’t work. Will not connect. This POS is t worth 50 cents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of junk
reviews.reviewText: The instructions are terrible. Their app, at least on my Android 12 phone, will not display my WiFi name when I try to connect it. Just says "unknown-ssid" and sticks there. Video quality on the micro SD card is abysmal and keeps starting and stopping at random times even when connected to a USB charger. Lots of lines even in static shots when nothing is moving. Seems to be about 2 FPS. I'm returning this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Read reviews and don’t waste your money
reviews.reviewText: This camera would not stay connected, took forever to connect then seconds later disconnected. Wouldn’t format sd card. User menu mostly didn’t respond to commands. Nothing about this camera works please DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Difficult to install and poor video quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won't be wireless without wire

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Of I could give 0 stars I would
reviews.reviewText: The camera I bought for my daughter to use in her office space, but she was out on vacation reason why it wasn’t set up immediately. She didn’t get it until 3 weeks later after I purchased it. We were not able to get it to work at all. We followed direction and watched the videos for troubleshooting and still it didn’t work. I tried to return but it didn’t give me an option for return after June 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I spent hours trying to get this to connect. Worthless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WTF Amazon! Zero stars
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Apparently it’s ok to put any piece of crap in a box and have Amazon sell it. I could have just as easily crapped in a box and tried connecting that to my wifi and got the same result. I mean seriously Amazon, how about a little accountability. Stop selling this product and others like it. So yea I’ll mention night vision, motion detection, and picture quality. These are all features one might expect when purchasing a camera. But I wouldn’t know if this P.O.S. has them. I didn’t make it that far. FYI I will be returning this turn but keeping the nifty little hard wire usb plug, for my trouble. So take that, Mr. That’s that.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very poor instructions and battery life
reviews.reviewText: The battery lasts about 5 minutes. The instructions were almost unreadable and poorly laid out. I do not recommend.
Wont last even an hour. No motion detection. Dont buy
Poor quality should have spent more.Cannot be bothered to return .I will be more cautious in future purchase .
Absolute piece of crap this camera , recieved with missing parts - no cable and the app did not workThankfully Amazon Providing a refundDO NOT BUY THIS
